entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inuvik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:08 AM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -36.8°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 33.
